title: FPV
description: First person view. Refers to the way the video feed from the drone looks.

title: vtx
description: Video transmitter. The module that takes your FPV camera feed and transmits it over (usually) 5.8GHz to your goggles or other video receiver.
author: Georgi

title: receiver
description: Usually refers to the radio receiver module on the drone. This is the unit that receives commands from your radio transmitter (controller).

title: transmitter
description: Your radio transmitter controller. The unit that sends instructions over (usually) 2.4GHz to the receiver on the drone
